author: andschwa
body:
Removed `namedResource` section when dotnet-resgen can produce C# bindings and resources.

VSO create date - 12/17/2015 13:18:00

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is utterly blocked and a major kink in the build process until resgen [supports](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/68) generating strongly typed classes.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: It is also what requires [windows-build](https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-windows-build) to be a submodule, as we need access to things we can only generate on Windows. It's very ugly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is now blocked on dotnet/cli#819

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We're now using `dotnet-resgen`, but still need C# bindings. Opening separate issue.

title: Cross-platform resgen
